scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:esm && npm run clean:cjs && npm run clean:umd && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:rel
scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:dist && npm run build:exe
scripts.build:sea: npm run build:sea:blob && npm run build:sea:cpnode && npm run build:sea:postject
scripts.build:sea:postject: npx postject bin/deploy-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod -w bin/deploy-linux
scripts.release: npm run tar && npm run zip
scripts.tar: npm run tar:linux && npm run tar:alpine && npm run tar:mac && npm run tar:win
scripts.tar:linux: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|deploy-linux|deploy|' -czvf rel/deploy-linux-x86.tar.gz deploy-linux
scripts.tar:alpine: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|deploy-alpine|deploy|' -czvf rel/deploy-alpine-x86.tar.gz deploy-alpine
scripts.tar:mac: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|deploy-macos|deploy|' -czvf rel/deploy-mac-x86.tar.gz deploy-macos
scripts.tar:win: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|deploy-win|deploy|' -czvf rel/deploy-win-x86.tar.gz deploy-win.exe
scripts.zip: npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:alpine && npm run zip:mac && npm run zip:win
scripts.zip:linux:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/deploy-linux-x86.zip bin/deploy-linux -j bin && printf '@ deploy-linux
@=deploy
' | zipnote -w rel/deploy-linux-x86.zip
scripts.zip:alpine:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/deploy-alpine-x86.zip bin/deploy-alpine -j bin && printf '@ deploy-alpine
@=deploy
' | zipnote -w rel/deploy-alpine-x86.zip
scripts.zip:mac:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/deploy-mac-x86.zip bin/deploy-macos -j bin && printf '@ deploy-macos
@=deploy
' | zipnote -w rel/deploy-mac-x86.zip
scripts.zip:win:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/deploy-win-x86.zip bin/deploy-win.exe -j bin && printf '@ deploy-win.exe
@=deploy.exe
' | zipnote -w rel/deploy-win-x86.zip
